name: BIRDS VS MOE
description:
The birds face the ultimate challenge as they must defeat moe in order to escape the Grid World! Luckily they have learned some new moves to help them out. THIS IS A JOKE DEMO!


-Menu
Arrow keys to select
Space to confirm
Keys 1-4 for char select
esc for pause
-Movement
left and right arrowkeys to move
Z to jump
Shift to sprint
arrowkeys + down + X to slide (pengi & pengo)
C to spin jump (spud)
C + up to spear jump (spud)
-Attack
X to attack
S to taunt attack (when burst bar half filled or more)
C to burst (when burst bar full) (automatic for spud)(buck has burst disabled)
